protocol.name: P-GSE20039-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE20039-2
protocol.text: Siliques containing bending cotyledon stage seeds were collected from 38-46 day old plants. Siliques were sub-divided and fixed in 3:1 (v/v) ethanol to acetic acid and embedded in paraffin. Microdissection of compartments was carried out on sections using a Leica LMD6000 system.

protocol.name: P-GSE20039-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown in a Conviron chamber under continuous light with fluorescent lamps at 20°C and 50%-70% relative humidity.

protocol.name: P-GSE20039-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the RNaqueous Micro-Kit (Ambion, Austin, TX) using a modified protocol incorporating an on-column DNase treatment (Qiagen RNase-Free DNase Set) during column washes.

protocol.name: P-GSE20039-5
protocol.text: 5 to 6 ng of total RNA was amplified using the WT-Ovation Pico RNA Amplification System (NuGEN, San Carlos, CA). cDNAs were fragmented and labeled with NuGEN FL-Ovation™ cDNA Biotin Module V2.

protocol.name: P-GSE20039-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, five micrograms of cDNA was hybridized for 18 hr at 45°C with the GeneChip ATH1 Arabidopsis Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained using the EukGE-WS2V4_450 protocol in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE20039-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G System.

protocol.name: P-GSE20039-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with the Affymetrix GeneChip Operating system 1.4 (GCOS) using default analysis settings and global scaling as a normalization method. The mean target intensity of each array was set to 500.
